feed.title: amorous.me
feed.subtitle: Use artificial intelligence to spark amorous ideas for you and your loved ones

entry.title: Essays: Generate dedicated poems for the one person!

link.title: Essays: Generate dedicated poems for the one person!

entry.content:
Trained by more than 250.000 lines of romance, you can write an essay about you and your loved ones. Right here, right now. Just insert your fantasies. Start with wordss like like: “One day Rosie and I”

UNDER CONSTRUCTION!

entry.title: AI Poems: Generate romantic essays for you loved ones.

entry.content:
Trained by the comprehensive body of 500 poems by the grandmasters of all times this neural net will produce fine input for you and your loved ones. Just try it like: “Eva loves to”
